statements: DELETE FROM DiseaseSpread WHERE patient_id = 500 AND disease_name = 'COVID-19';
DELETE FROM DiseaseSpread WHERE case_id = 100 AND patient_id = 101;
DELETE FROM DiseaseSpread WHERE disease_name = 'COVID-19' AND date_diagnosed < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM transmission_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 789 AND transmission_type = 'Airborne';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM transmission WHERE source_location = 'Hospital A' AND date_transmitted < '2022-01-01';
